availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Calvin Rufus Stuart (Simpson County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, laborer, farmer. Sumner County, Tennessee native. Son of Robert Stuart and Elizabeth Bibb Stuart. Married to Louisa Stewart Stuart in Simpson County, Kentucky, on December 25, 1857. Father of Jesse L. Stuart and Edward B. Stuart. Laborer in Simpson County in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kentucky County, p. 51A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 9.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Subdistrict 150, p. 62A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-58, Simpson County Marriages, p. 6 (accessed via ancestry.com).
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7016184, Simpson County Deaths, File #11672.
